keyMoments.title: Koza Confronts the Fake King
keyMoments.description: Koza confronts the figure he believes to be King Cobra in Nanohana after hearing the fake king confess to using Dance Powder. Despite his father's teachings to trust the king, this apparent confession destroys Koza's remaining faith.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the complete breakdown of trust between the rebels and the royal family, pushing Koza past the point of no return.
keyMoments.quote: Father told me to trust the king... but after seeing this, hearing him confess with his own mouth...

keyMoments.title: Koza is Shot by Guards
keyMoments.description: Koza is shot and wounded by guards when he rushes to confront the fake king, which he interprets as the monarchy declaring war on the people.
keyMoments.significance: The wounding serves as final justification for the rebellion to march on Alubarna.
keyMoments.quote: They shot me... The king has declared war on his own people!

keyMoments.title: Koza Recalls His Journey as Rebel Leader
keyMoments.description: Koza remembers his father's advice, the rebellion's growth to 100,000 soldiers, and his evolution from hopeful citizen to militant rebel leader.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for Koza's internal conflict and humanizes the rebellion.

keyMoments.title: Discovers Weapons Cache
keyMoments.description: Koza and the rebels discover that the crashed ship is full of weapons, providing them with the arsenal needed for their assault on Alubarna.
keyMoments.significance: The weapons enable the rebellion to launch their attack, though the rebels don't realize this is part of Baroque Works' manipulation.

keyMoments.title: Orders Rebel Army to March on Alubarna
keyMoments.description: With weapons, wounds from guards, and the king's confession, Koza orders the rebel army to begin their assault on the capital.
keyMoments.significance: This is the point of no return for Arabasta, marking the beginning of the civil war that Crocodile has orchestrated.
keyMoments.quote: Rebel army! We march on Alubarna!

reveals.information: Koza's complete loss of faith in the monarchy and commitment to war despite his father's teachings

keyMoments.title: Kappa Discovers Mr. 2's Deception
keyMoments.description: Young boy Kappa witnesses Mr. 2 Bon Clay's true identity beneath the King Cobra disguise but is attacked and severely wounded by Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger before he can alert others.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how close the truth came to being revealed and the ruthlessness of Baroque Works in silencing witnesses.

reveals.information: First appearance of Kappa, a young citizen of Nanohana

keyMoments.title: Explains Operation Utopia
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals the full details of Operation Utopia to Vivi, explaining his plan to overthrow Arabasta and acquire the ancient weapon Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: First complete explanation of the main antagonist's master plan and ultimate goal.
keyMoments.quote: This is Operation Utopia - the plan to take over Arabasta and acquire Pluton.

keyMoments.title: Throws Cage Key to Bananawani
keyMoments.description: Crocodile shows Vivi and the Straw Hats the key to their cage, then cruelly throws it into a pit of Bananawani.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's sadistic nature and confidence in his victory.
keyMoments.quote: Here's the key to your cage. Unfortunately, it's now with the Bananawani.

reveals.information: Crocodile's ultimate goal is to acquire the ancient weapon Pluton hidden in Arabasta
Full details of Operation Utopia: orchestrating civil war to overthrow the monarchy and find Pluton

keyMoments.title: Learns Full Details of Operation Utopia
keyMoments.description: Vivi is shocked into silence as Crocodile explains his entire plan to destroy her kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Vivi learns the full scope of the conspiracy against Arabasta.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Give Up Despite Imprisonment
keyMoments.description: Despite being imprisoned and watching Crocodile throw away the cage key, Vivi regains her spirit and attempts to escape, determined to stop the war.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Vivi's unwavering determination and refusal to surrender even against impossible odds.
keyMoments.quote: I won't give up! I have to stop this war!

reveals.information: Vivi's determination to save her kingdom remains unshaken even in the face of seemingly impossible circumstances

keyMoments.title: Impersonates King Cobra
keyMoments.description: Mr. 2 uses his Mane Mane no Mi to perfectly impersonate King Cobra and makes a public confession about Dance Powder, announcing plans to destroy Nanohana.
keyMoments.significance: This impersonation is the key catalyst that pushes the rebellion past the point of no return and removes any doubt among the rebels.
keyMoments.quote: I confess - I have been using Dance Powder to steal the rain from you all! And now I must eliminate Nanohana to prevent this truth from reaching the Marines!

abilities.description: Mr. 2 demonstrates the devastating effectiveness of his Clone-Clone Fruit by perfectly impersonating King Cobra, fooling even those close to the king.

reveals.information: Mr. 2 can use his Clone-Clone Fruit to impersonate royalty so perfectly that he can make public announcements and fool entire cities

keyMoments.title: Attacks Nanohana with Armory Ship
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger crash a massive armory ship into Nanohana's harbor, causing destruction and providing weapons for the rebels.
keyMoments.significance: Coordinated attack serves dual purposes: creating chaos and arming the rebel forces.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Kappa to Silence Witness
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger attack and severely wound young Kappa who discovered Mr. 2's deception.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ruthlessness of Baroque Works in eliminating witnesses.

name.japanese: ミス・ダブルフィンガー

keyMoments.title: Attacks Nanohana with Armory Ship
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger and Mr. 1 crash a massive armory ship into Nanohana's harbor as part of Operation Utopia.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the coordinated Baroque Works operation to escalate the civil war.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Kappa to Silence Witness
keyMoments.description: Miss Doublefinger and Mr. 1 attack young Kappa who witnessed Mr. 2's true identity.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Baroque Works' ruthlessness in protecting their operations.
